column4: hi people - I'm trying to re-install ubuntu, but the live cd installer seems to drop me to a sort of 'busybox' terminal without further info. I've done a bit of googling but couldn't find anything relevant. Any suggestions?
Obviously I've installed it successfully before! Perhaps it's something to do with the fact it's already installed?
(I am trying to swap from x64 to x32)
can't help, but "obviously" is usually the reason why something easy fails :)
